name: Susan (allinardo)
description:
Originally posted to GameJolt, Susan was my first dip back into horror since 2014 when I had created Kebao with my at-the-time best friend.
Watch the trailer

Susan has you take the role of a detective, investigating the death of William Ashenbury's daughter, Susan.

This game is a prequel to a project I am currently working on known as Ashenbury.
